column5: Good Afternoon! I have the Day off on Monday and Looking for a lake to get out on to do some bass fishing. Its a 12ft Zodiac with a 9.9 so not looking for big water. Something within 2 - 3 hours of Niagara?
Fish the kawarthas. They are absolutely loaded with bass.
Check the winds and fish Erie.   One of the best lakes you'll ever find.
Don't have to go far...the Niagara River (upper and lower) has awesome Smallie fishing . If you venture up Chippewa Creek you'll find some Largies too
where did you end up and how did it go?
Ended up at chippewa...gotta few for dinner!
